code: import Web3 from"web3";const getWeb3=()=>new Promise((resolve,reject)=>{window.addEventListener("load",async()=>{if(window.ethereum){const web3=new Web3(window.ethereum);try{await window.ethereum.enable();resolve(web3);}catch(error){reject(error);}}else if(window.web3){const web3=window.web3;console.log("Injected web3 detected.");resolve(web3);}else{const provider=new Web3.providers.HttpProvider("http://127.0.0.1:8545");const web3=new Web3(provider);console.log("No web3 instance injected, using Local web3.");resolve(web3);}});});export default getWeb3;
